sections.purpose: To rapidly reduce particle size of hard plant materials by high-speed impact.
sections.scope: Applicable to size reduction of seeds, roots, and barks in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Install appropriate screen size for desired particle size.
Feed dried material gradually into the hopper.
Clean chamber and hammers after use.
Sieve powder if further size classification is needed.
precautions: Do not open hopper while running.
Ground the mill to prevent static sparks.
